title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4603.1 - Approval by municipality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4603.1 - Approval by municipality

State Regulations

Upon investigation by the municipal governing body and
approval of a license application or an amendment of a license, the duly
authorized officer of the municipality shall record the findings and
determination in duplicate form GC-4, "Findings and Determination for Games of

Chance License," as prescribed by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4603.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
